Match blocks in parallel

Source: R/matching_parallel.R
match_blocks_parallel.Rd

Match blocks in parallel

Usage

match_blocks_parallel(
  blocks,
  left,
  right,
  left_ids,
  right_ids,
  block_col,
  vars,
  distance,
  weights,
  scale,
  max_distance,
  calipers,
  method,
  parallel = FALSE
)

Arguments

blocks

Vector of block IDs

left

Left dataset with block_col

right

Right dataset with block_col

left_ids

IDs from left

right_ids

IDs from right

block_col

Name of blocking column

vars

Variables for matching

distance

Distance metric

weights

Variable weights

scale

Scaling method

max_distance

Maximum distance

calipers

Caliper constraints

method

LAP method

parallel

Whether to use parallel processing

Value

List with combined results from all blocks
